reviewText:
Volume 2 offers more games and exercises for training your dog to be safe around children.

Also, in Volume 2, the trainer has a couple parts of the video where she talks to children about how to stay safe with dogs.

Finally, she offers a good review of the differing dog rules for infants, toddlers and children.

If every family watched these videos and did these exercises with their dogs, many more dogs and families would be able to live together forever in a safe and happy house.  Win - Win for everyone and every dog.
